comment: Runs auto tactical-turn control for the active unit selecting target tiles and issuing follow-up command packets as needed.
Evaluates tactical action outcome against a tile occupant including cost and resolution multipliers then applies resulting state updates.
Applies tactical action effects with feedback SFX and removes defeated/finished unit entries when required.
Consumes tactical resources for mine action plays feedback and queues follow-up tactical event packet.
Handles tactical toolbar command tags for army battle view then dispatches panel event.
Handles naval tactical toolbar mode toggles and command tags then dispatches panel event.
